title: Interlayer surface energy control for high-efficiency printed organic photovoltaic cells
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03670K, Paper
Jianqiu Wang, Yafei Wang, Mengzhen Du, Yue Yu, Chaoyi Wang, Wenxuan Wang, Qing Guo, Yong Cui, Shaoqing Zhang, Jianhui Hou
Incorporating NiO nanoparticles into PEDOT controls the surface energy of interface layer, enabling the manipulation of film formation kinetics and morphology of active layer. Consequently, 1.03 cm2 cells achieved 18.5% efficiency.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
